message: I would appreciate it if a member would review me and let me in. I just applied for membership on @forrst, mind checking out my application? http://forrst.com/i/hPi #joinforrst
@garrettholborn Sending an invite.
(If you don't already have one.)
@garrettholborn do you have any other work?
@blaines Anything I've done other than that site has been a collaboration with my brother. We're working on www.MakeVolu.me right now and need a graphics guy for a landing page background.
@blaines :D
@garrettholborn You're welcome. :)
@garrettholborn do you have a github account?
@micrypt Thank you, you sped that up a lot for me.
@blaines Sorry to say, I'm not a github user. You can browse through the head of the projects portfolio www.grahamholborn.com if you want
@garrettholborn Sent. :)

Not to hijack your thread or anything but how does one go about getting an invite to forrst if the majority of the work they've done has been in the corporate world? That is the situation I am in and am now looking to collaborate with designers for startup ideas.
@smallinov i didn't have a problem getting an invite once i signed up, even though most of my work has been for corporations.
